text: Bring Me the Head of Mavis Davis is a 1997 British dark comedy movie. It is directed by John Henderson. Actors include: Rik Mayall, Jane Horrocks, Danny Aiello, Ronald Pickup, Marc Warren and Ross Boatman. The movie and plot reference the Sam Peckinpah 1974 movie Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia. ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:English-language movies
title: Bring Me the Head of Mavis Davis
